bean.comment: Mobile application sample of a chat that can be use offline using the FullSync

bean.description:
Attachment path | This path is either absolute or relative to Convertigo environment. Relative paths starting with:

• ./ are relative to Convertigo workspace,
• .// are relative to current project folder.
Set the owner of the document if the "Acl Policy"="From _c8oACL variable"
